column2: IDEA-147080 Groovy Pointless Boolean Inspection should remove double negation

column3:
Groovy Pointless Boolean Inspection should simplify by removing
the double negation when it is the case.
you could use Boolean.parseBoolean(operand) here, and .toString it later
this seems dangerous (will replace a single negation also), and is repeated in the code
Please provide some examples in the description of the commit, it's not obvious to me what happened before, and what happens now.
Also, more tests might help as well :)
! is not a sign (you call it prefix below)

hey @vladmm
could you resolve the conflicts?
Groovy Pointless Boolean Inspection in double negation context
